title: this is what awesome film-making and acting looks like.
review: thoughtful in every possible manner, no punches are pulled. when the camera is dutch, it means something. when you see the actor's key light on the wrong side, it's for a reason. this a rare film with the BALLS to actually execute it's intention to the fullest. it just gets better with each viewing. i certainly recommend the directors cut DVD to those who unfortunately missed in on the big screen. cheers...
